sqlQuery.name: ByNameList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, ($$group_names$$) ds WHERE og.name = ds.group_name UNION SELECT sa.group_name FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr, ($$group_names$$) ds WHERE sa.group_name is not null AND sa.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id AND seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups' AND ref.primary_identifier = ds.group_name

sqlQuery.name: ByAccession
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.name LIKE replace($$group_name$$, '*', '%') UNION SELECT sa.group_name FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr WHERE sa.group_name is not null AND sa.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id AND seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups' AND ref.primary_identifier LIKE replace($$group_name$$, '*', '%') UNION SELECT sa.group_name FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa WHERE (sa.source_id LIKE replace($$group_name$$, '*', '%') OR sa.full_id LIKE replace($$group_name$$, '*', '%')) AND sa.group_name is not null

sqlQuery.name: ByPfamIdOrKeyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT group_name FROM ApidbTuning.DomainAssignment WHERE group_name is not null AND (accession LIKE UPPER(REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%')) OR symbol LIKE REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%') OR description LIKE REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%'))

sqlQuery.name: ByKeyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT sa.group_name FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, dots.AaSequenceImp asi WHERE sa.group_name is not null AND sa.aa_sequence_id = asi.aa_sequence_id AND asi.subclass_view = 'ExternalAASequence' AND CATSEARCH(asi.description, $$keyword$$, '')>0

sqlQuery.name: BySequenceCount
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.number_of_members >= $$sequence_count_min$$ AND og.number_of_members <= $$sequence_count_max$$

sqlQuery.name: ByGenomeCount
sqlQuery.sql: select group_name, count(distinct taxon_id) genome_count from ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes where group_name is not null group by group_name having count(distinct taxon_id) between $$genome_count_min$$ and $$genome_count_max$$ order by count(distinct taxon_id), group_name

sqlQuery.name: ByAvgConnectivity
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name as group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE avg_connectivity between $$percent_min$$ AND $$percent_max$$

sqlQuery.name: ByPercentMatchPairs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name as group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE percent_match_pairs between $$percent_min$$ AND $$percent_max$$

sqlQuery.name: ByPercentIdentity
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.avg_percent_identity >= $$percent_min$$ AND og.avg_percent_identity <= $$percent_max$$

sqlQuery.name: ByPercentMatch
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.avg_percent_match >= $$percent_min$$ AND og.avg_percent_match <= $$percent_max$$

sqlQuery.name: ByEValue
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.avg_evalue_exp >= $$evalue_min$$ AND og.avg_evalue_exp <= $$evalue_max$$

sqlQuery.name: ByPhyleticPattern
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, ($$phyletic_expression$$) ex WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = ex.ortholog_group_id

sqlQuery.name: ByEcNumber
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct sa.group_name from ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, dots.AaSequenceEnzymeClass asec, sres.enzymeClass ec where ec.ec_number LIKE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(lower($$ec_number_type_ahead$$),' ',''),'-', '%'),'*','%'),'any','%') and asec.enzyme_class_id = ec.enzyme_class_id and sa.aa_sequence_id = asec.aa_sequence_id and sa.group_name is not null

sqlQuery.name: FromSequences
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.group_name, sum(answer.wdk_weight) AS wdk_weight FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, ($$sequence_answer$$) answer WHERE sa.full_id = answer.full_id AND sa.group_name is not null GROUP BY sa.group_name

sqlQuery.name: AllGroups
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name AS group_name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og
